install.name: Content - Picture Cube Plugin
install.author: Nguyen Hoang Viet
install.copyright: This extension in released under the GNU/GPL License - http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html
install.description: 3D rotate images. Using: {picturecube}{/picturecube}, or {picturecube width="450" hight="350" cubesize="200"}img_1_link|img_2_link|img_3_link|img_4_link|img_5_link|img_6_link{/picturecube}. This plugin is based on 3d Rotating Image Cube at http://www.bezzmedia.com/swfspot/ . Example: {picturecube}http://vatlieu.us/plugins/content/plg_picturecube/picturecube06.jpg|http://vatlieu.us/plugins/content/plg_picturecube/picturecube01.jpg|http://vatlieu.us/plugins/content/plg_picturecube/picturecube02.jpg|http://vatlieu.us/plugins/content/plg_picturecube/picturecube03.jpg|http://vatlieu.us/plugins/content/plg_picturecube/picturecube04.jpg|http://vatlieu.us/plugins/content/plg_picturecube/picturecube05.jpg{/picturecube}.

param.name: src
param.label: Image URL
param.description: Type in 6 full URLs like http://www.abc.com/x.jpg, separated by '|'

param.name: width
param.label: Frame Width
param.description: Type in the width of your frame in pixels or %.

param.name: height
param.label: Frame Height
param.description: Type in the height of your frame in pixels.

param.name: cubesize
param.label: Cube Size
param.description: Type in the margin width of your frame in pixels.
